snippet: American manufacturing grew slightly last month and factory hiring increased, suggesting that the economy had some momentum going into the new year.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management says its index of manufacturing activity rose to 50.7 in December, up from 49.5 in November.
lead_paragraph: American manufacturing grew slightly last month and factory hiring increased, suggesting that the economy had some momentum going into the new year.

headline.main: U.S. Manufacturing Increased Slightly in December
headline.print_headline: U.S. Manufacturing Increased Slightly in December
